body_content.explanation: an expert in working with fireworks (= small containers filled with explosive chemicals that produce bright coloured patterns or loud noises when they explode), for example for public displays or on a film set:
examples: All fireworks are illegal unless operated by a licensed pyrotechnician.
Deep blues and dazzling white bursts show the work of the top-notch pyrotechnician.

body_content.explanation: someone who does something with a lot of skill and is very impressive :
examples: The show featured a young guitar pyrotechnician.
Tom Stoppard has enjoyed a reputation as a dazzling pyrotechnician of stage language.
